mapper.select: select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.NAME, m.ID, m.PASSWORD, m.TEL, m.SUB_ADDR_SEQ from MEMBER m order by m.MEMBER_SEQ
select ma.ABILITY_NAME from MEMBER m, MEMBER_ABILITY_REL mr, ABILITIES ma where mr.ABILITY_SEQ = ma.ABILITY_SEQ and mr.MEMBER_SEQ = m.MEMBER_SEQ and m.MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
select ID, PASSWORD from MEMBER where ID = #{id}
select sub.SUB_ADDR_NAME, sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ from sub_address sub, address addr where sub.ADDR_SEQ = addr.ADDR_SEQ and addr.ADDR_SEQ=#{ADDR_SEQ}
select * from address order by ADDR_SEQ

select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.NAME, m.ID, m.PASSWORD, m.TEL, sub.SUB_ADDR_NAME, addr.ADDR_NAME from MEMBER m, address addr, sub_address sub where m.SUB_ADDR_SEQ = sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ and sub.ADDR_SEQ = addr.ADDR_SEQ and m.MEMBER_SEQ=#{MEMBER_SEQ}

choose.when: select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.NAME, m.ID, m.PASSWORD, m.TEL, sub.SUB_ADDR_NAME, addr.ADDR_NAME from MEMBER m, address addr, sub_address sub where m.SUB_ADDR_SEQ = sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ and sub.ADDR_SEQ = addr.ADDR_SEQ and m.ID=#{id}
choose.otherwise: select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.NAME, m.ID, m.PASSWORD, m.TEL from MEMBER m where m.ID=#{id}

mapper.select: select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.NAME, m.ID, m.PASSWORD, m.TEL, sub.SUB_ADDR_NAME, addr.ADDR_NAME from MEMBER m, address addr, sub_address sub where m.SUB_ADDR_SEQ = sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ and sub.ADDR_SEQ = addr.ADDR_SEQ and m.MEMBER_SEQ=#{MEMBER_SEQ}

select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.NAME, m.ID, m.PASSWORD, m.TEL, abi.ABILITY_NAME, rel.MANAGER, rel.OBTAIN_DATE from member_ability_rel rel, abilities abi, member m where m.MEMBER_SEQ = rel.MEMBER_SEQ and rel.ABILITY_SEQ = abi.ABILITY_SEQ and rel.MEMBER_SEQ = m.MEMBER_SEQ and m.MEMBER_SEQ=#{MEMBER_SEQ} ORDER BY rel.OBTAIN_DATE ASC

select sub.SUB_ADDR_NAME,sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ, addr.ADDR_NAME, addr.ADDR_SEQ from member m, sub_address sub, address addr where m.SUB_ADDR_SEQ=sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ and sub.ADDR_SEQ = addr.ADDR_SEQ and sub.SUB_ADDR_SEQ=#{SUB_ADDR_SEQ}
mapper.insert: insert into member_ability_rel (MEMBER_SEQ, ABILITY_SEQ, MANAGER, OBTAIN_DATE) value(#{MEMBER_SEQ},#{ability},#{MANAGER},#{OBTAIN_DATE})
mapper.select: select* from member where VISIBLE='TRUE' order by NAME ASC Limit #{pagination.pageBegin},10
select count(MEMBER_SEQ) from member where VISIBLE='TRUE'
mapper.update: update member set VISIBLE='FLASE' where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select *from member where NAME=#{input} and VISIBLE='TRUE'
select *from member where ID=#{input} and VISIBLE='TRUE'
select *from member where TEL=#{input} and VISIBLE='TRUE'
